text: 26.63: Ais 53.7; Mt 27.12Ana maaŋ Zisas ga nzuaim, Zisas buna thueŋ nzuai fhuvara. Ana fhura kim, Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pan khaŋ ana nzuai, “Gu zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki Fhe Bakɨme zɨ zitav ndu nzuai, ndu ntigem khaŋ suaŋri, kha vun ki guma na kaŋgi guigira. Ndu Fhe Bakɨme taagia wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap sarigi gumaeŋ? Ndu Fhe Bakɨmen Kam o, fhu?”
